english: Her work was divided between tutoring and research .
chinese: 她兼做导师工作和研究工作。

english: The students have submitted their essays to their tutors .
chinese: 学生把论文递交给导师。

english: "i speak for all", said the tutor, stoutly .
chinese: “我为大伙儿在说话，”导师坚定地说。

english: You are the leader and teacher of our whole medical work .
chinese: 你是我们整个医疗工作的领导人和导师。

english: My heart was filled with gladness that i was able to attend our teacher .
chinese: 我因为能来护理我们导师，心里非常高兴。
导师造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He had flung a leg of lamb at some indelicate disturbing tutor .
chinese: 他曾经在那儿把一只羊腿扔到一个粗鄙惹人的导师的身上。

english: He was elected a fellow of trinity college in cambridge and assistant tutor .
chinese: 他当选为剑桥的三一学院的研究员和助理导师。

english: Dick white's delivery was much more in the style of the oxbridge don .
chinese: 迪克怀特的讲演颇有牛津和剑桥两个大学的导师的味道。

english: It was to the scandal of mr. buck the tutor that pen's extravagances became known .
chinese: 潘的挥霍成性，导师巴克先生知道以后非常生气。

english: The tutor, appalled by the indiscretion, reported him to gchq, and he was sacked .
chinese: 导师对此种轻率行为大吃一惊，向英国通信总部检举了他，于是他被开除了。

english: Left alone and separated from all earthy counsel, she had resource to a friend and adviser .
chinese: 她孑然一人，在世间找不到人商量，她就求助于一个朋友和导师。

english: To quote someone i ' ve learned quite a bit from ,
chinese: 引用一个对我很重要的导师的话，

english: Training programme for tarot consultants and tarot tutors
chinese: 培训塔罗牌顾问及导师

english: Tutors and experts will fire questions at you
chinese: 导师和专家们会向你一连串地发问
